text: Per Holmström (13 February 1901 - 27 January 1982) was a Swedish swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre backstroke event at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Swedish male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Sweden Category:Swimmers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Gothenburg Category:Swedish male backstroke swimmers
title: Per Holmström
